theory_test_entry_alert: Did you know that 1 in 2 learners Fail their theory test?
theory_test_entry_message: It's important to remember that this app contains a SAMPLE of the DVSA revision questions. In order to fully prepare for you test, we strongly recommend that you upgrade to the full version which includes ALL the DVSA revision questions, covering EVERYTHING that you will be asked in your test. IMPORTANT: The 2020 question bank for learner car drivers now contain 730 questions. Any app that has more or less that 730 questions contains the OLD question set.
are_you_finding_me_helpful: Are you finding me helpful? Spread the love.
share_with_friends: Share with your friends and family!
do_you_have_everything: Do you have everything for your Theory Test?
no_flagged_answer: There are no flagged answers from this practise.
no_correct_answer: There are no correct answers from this practise.
no_incorrect_answer: There are no incorrect answers from this practise.
no_question_answered: No questions answered from this test.
no_flagged_answer_mock: There are no flagged answers from this test.
no_correct_answer_mock: There are no correct answers from this test.
no_incorrect_answer_mock: There are no incorrect answers from this test.
your_progress_over_time: Your progress over time - tap a circle for more details
score_achieved_on_last_session: Score achieved on last practise session:
learning_to_become: I'm learning to become a qualified...
test_paused_message: The test can not be continued if you choose to quit.
no_unseen_left_info: There are no unseen questions left. To fill the full test previously incorrectly answered questions and other random questions will be added.
no_incorrectly_answered_questions_info: You haven't answered enough questions incorrectly to do a whole test. Random questions will be added.
no_favourite_questions_info: There are not enough favourite questions to do a whole test. Random questions will be added.
random_questions_info: You have correctly answered all the question. Random questions will be added.
not_enough_questions_info1: The maximum number of questions in the test is
not_enough_questions_info2: . This is because the selected categories can not fill your chosen
flagged_questions_message: Do you want to review the questions you flagged?
show_answer: Show answer - if you reveal the question you will not score for this answer.
try_again: Try again - you can still score a point if you get this question correct.
no_question_found: Your search does not match any question.
mock_intro_message: You will have 57 minutes to answer 50 multiple choice questions. You need to correctly answer 43 or more in order to achieve a pass.
reset_message: Are you sure you want to reset your progress scores? Please note that this will wipe all your practise and mock test progress.
cancel_play_message: The test has been paused. If you quit your progress will be lost and you will have to start again.
